item.title: Crispy Southwest Eggrolls
item.description: Homemade southwest eggrolls with seasoned chicken, black beans, corn, and melted cheese in a shatteringly crisp wrapper. Ready in 30 minutes with frying or baking options.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 15 minutes

â° Total Time: 30 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 12

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 cup (140g) cooked chicken, shredded
  • 1/2 cup (85g) black beans, rinsed and drained
  • 1/2 cup (75g) corn kernels, thawed if frozen
  • 1/2 cup (55g) shredded sharp cheddar cheese
  • 1/4 cup (40g) red bell pepper, finely diced
  • 2 tablespoons green onions, thinly sliced
  • 1 teaspoon chili powder
  • 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin
  • 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder
  • 1/4 teaspoon salt
  • 1/8 teaspoon black pepper
  • 12 eggroll wrappers
  • 2 cups (480ml) vegetable or canola oil for frying
